structure_sections.description: "İyi akşamlar değerli izleyenler" - The presenter, Hande Bayraktar, greets the viewers and introduces the main headlines of the day, indicating the start of the program.

structure_sections.start_sentence: Hamas lideri Haniye Tahran'da suikaste kurban gitmesi
structure_sections.description: "Hamas lideri Haniye Tahran'da suikaste kurban gitmesi" - This section contains the main news content, discussing the assassination of Hamas leader Haniye in Tehran, the reactions from Turkish officials, and the implications of the event on international relations.
